price: 36. Umana malaynayo inay Saacadda (Qiyaame) weligeed dhici, haddii la ii celiyona xagga Rabbigay waxaan ka heli meel tani ka rug doorsi iyo meel noqosho fiican.
arabic: وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةٗ وَلَئِن رُّدِدتُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي لَأَجِدَنَّ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَا مُنقَلَبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā aẓunnu al-sāʿata qāimatan wala-in rudidttu ilā rabbī la-ajidanna khayran min'hā munqalaban
